categories: Farmer John Front Zip Neoprene Wetsuit
description: On a board or in a boat, the design allows a full range of natural motion. The neoprene is warm enough to provide immersion protection for pushing the paddling season into spring or fall, but it's not so thick that it feels heavy or constricting when worn all day.3mm neoprene in the body and 2.5mm in the side panels strikes a balance between warmth in the water and comfort while paddling.Flat lock stitching won't rub or chafe.Armless design allows a full range of motion.Reinforced knees and seat.Skin-tight fit reduces cold water flushing in and out while immersed.Full front zip makes changing a breeze.
name: Level Six Farmer John Front Zip Neoprene Wetsuit - Men's
